item.title: 【HD Live Performances】FEED - Coldplay - Music of the Spheres, Buenos Aires, Argentina, 2022 [caladan]
item.description:
This video is a "streamlined" 4.5GB version of this almost 20GB recording. The conversion took many hours.

My edits of the source video: deinterlaced, cropped the black bars, cropped the non-concert advertising intro, converted to mp4, converted the audio from AC3 5.1 to AAC stereo and increased the volume without clipping, added a text file with the setlist.
